pullrequest.title: Add Transform Controller for translating, rotating, and scaling nodes

content.raw: This is very nice. Are there plans to also support moving and rotating the object in the global coordinate frame? For example, after I rotate an object I may want to move it on the global XY plane and not in the local XY plane.
content.html: This is very nice. Are there plans to also support moving and rotating the object in the global coordinate frame? For example, after I rotate an object I may want to move it on the global XY plane and not in the local XY plane.
